H0.text: What are the topmost 7 vertebrae of the backbone called. Thoracic

H1.text: What are the topmost 7 vertebrae of the backbone called. Lumbar

H2.text: What are the topmost 7 vertebrae of the backbone called. Sacral

H3.text: What are the topmost 7 vertebrae of the backbone called. Cervical

A4.text: By convention, the cervical vertebrae are numbered, with the first one (C1) closest to the skull and higher numbered vertebrae (C2â€“C7) proceeding away from the skull and down the spine.

A5.text: The atlas (C1) is the topmost vertebra and along with the axis forms the joint connecting the skull and spine.
